mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_GB='N' ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NUM, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_DEL_GB, ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_BOARD_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{BOARD_WRITER}, #{BOARD_CONTENT}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
